DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect high intensity interval exercise ( HIIT ) standard intensity non-interval exercise fitness cardiac rehabilitation patient CAD . Also assess practical implementation HIIT cardiac rehabilitation .
DOC.brief_title: Higher Intensity Interval Training Cardiac Rehabilitation
DOC.criteria: Age 1875 year Male female Angiographic documentation CAD Unstable angina pectoris MI / PCI < 3 week CABG < 4weeks Exercise induce ischemia > 1mm ST depression LVEF < 40 % complex ventricular arrhythmia atrial fibrillation orthopedic limitation treadmill exercise
